Browser not supported

This browser cannot access MIDI devices connected to the computer.

Please use Chrome, Edge or Opera. Or, consider using the microphone instead.

MIDI device not connected

The app can't find any MIDI devices connected to this computer.

Please connect one via an input port. More information on this is available here.

Accelerando

This app helps you practise your scales by giving you a score each time you attempt one!

It allows saves your attempts so you can track your progression towards mastering your scales.

If you have a MIDI connection on your piano, we recommend that you use this. This allows your score to be much more accurate.

Play a scale to see your score!
